name: Jay Munly
description: '''Jayson Thompson''', who goes by the stage name '''Jay Munly''' or '''Munly''', is an American singer, songwriter and musician based in [[Denver, Colorado]]. He is known for his role in the development of the [[Gothic country|Denver Sound]], which is music that mixes elements of [[country music|country]], [[Gothic rock|gothic]], [[Folk music|folk]] and [[gospel music|gospel]] native to that city. He is a member of [[Slim Cessna's Auto Club]], [[Petr & the Wulf|Munly and the Lupercalians]], and The Denver Broncos UK (DBUK). He was a founding member of Munly and the Lee Lewis Harlots, active from 2000 to 2007. He was also a member of The Road Home in 2015.
